name: SuperSpeller
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super speller
des:
Prepare school going kids for the Scripps spelling bee contest and school spelling bee contest, quizzes.

This is a single-player version of the competition, the vocabulary is created each year by word list from Scripps National Spelling Bee. This skill has 4100 words so far!

How to use:
1 Just say 'Alexa, open super speller'
2 Skill have three difficulty levels, you have to choose one
3 Skill will start asking for spellings
4 To know the definition of a word you can say something 'definition, please'
5 To finish the quiz, you can say 'Stop'
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
